content: this point - in my sample i had 67 ridges section 2 on the next row you will join & knit with color b row 1 rs k to last 2 sts sl2 wyib row 2 ws p2 k to last 2 sts sl2 wyif repeat row 1-2 until measures approx 19 5 /50 cm making sure you have the same number of ridges as in section 1 cut color b section 3 on the next row you will join & knit with color c row 1 rs k to last 2 sts sl2 wyib row 2 ws p2 k to last 2 sts sl2 wyif repeat row 1-2 until measures approx 19 5 /50 cm making sure you have the same number of ridges as in sections 1 & 2 but ending after working a rs row bobble all sts on the next ws row as follows bobble the first 2 sts purlwise then bobble knitwise to 2 sts before the end then bobble the last 2 sts purlwise finishing weave in ends and block if desired note i didn t need to block mine but you can if you like www elizabethsmithknits com 3 elizabeth smith k n i t s find me online website elizabethsmithknits com pattern support email me at info@elizabethsmithknits com sharing on social media make sure to tag me @elizabethsmithknits i love to see finished photos images and pattern © 2020 elizabeth smith knits all rights reserved www elizabethsmithknits com 4
